com.foreach.across.core.annotations

Annotation Type ModuleConfiguration


  • @Target(value=TYPE)
 @Retention(value=RUNTIME)
 @Documented
 @Configuration
public @interface ModuleConfiguration
    Extension of Configuration to declare configurations that should not be added to the current BeanDefinitionRegistry, but rather be added to the registry of the modules specified in the value() attribute.
    Author:
    Arne Vandamme

    • Optional Element Summary

      Optional Elements 
      Modifier and Type Optional Element and Description
      String beanName
      Explicitly specify the name of the Spring bean definition associated with this Configuration class.
      boolean deferred
      Should this additional configuration be added after the initial module configuration (true) or before (false).
      String[] exclude
      List of module names where this configuration should not be imported.
      boolean optional
      Should this additional configuration be considered optional (defaults to false).
      String[] value
      List of module names where this configuration should be imported.

    • Element Detail

      • deferred

        public abstract boolean deferred
        Should this additional configuration be added after the initial module configuration (true) or before (false). Default is true so extension configurations can override beandefinitions or act on conditional creation from the original module config.
        Default:
        true

      • optional

        public abstract boolean optional
        Should this additional configuration be considered optional (defaults to false). Optional module configurations will not force a separate module ApplicationContext to be started.
        Default:
        false

      • value

        public abstract String[] value
        List of module names where this configuration should be imported. If the list is empty this configuration will be added to all modules.
        Default:
        {}

      • exclude

        public abstract String[] exclude
        List of module names where this configuration should not be imported. Takes precedence over value() and is mainly useful if value() is empty which would imply the configuration would be added to all modules (including the module providing the configuration).
        Default:
        {}

      • beanName

        @AliasFor(annotation=org.springframework.context.annotation.Configuration.class,
          attribute="value")
public abstract String beanName
        Explicitly specify the name of the Spring bean definition associated with this Configuration class. If left unspecified (the common case), a bean name will be automatically generated.
        Returns:
        the suggested component name, if any (or empty String otherwise)
        See Also:
        DefaultBeanNameGenerator
        Default:
        ""
